name: Dangeon (Wendel Scardua)
description:
Assemble a party of 4 characters and navigate the dungeons of the evil Elemental Emperor, who stole the power of the elements from the gods. 

Fight monsters, gain experience, then defeat the four elemental guardians in order to gain access to the Elemental Emperor's Enclave.

...

Except I just started coding this yesterday, so there's no battles, no bosses, no keys, etc. So this is just a prototype. But at least there's a nice maze to navigate, for now.

Most of the placeholder graphics (and the 'walking around pseudo-engine') are from my last Ludum Dare entry, Tense Conds. Other placeholder graphics, like the party characters, I drew this afternoon.
